channel.title: Stopping admins from trading or dropping? (317)
channel.description: OK i cannot find this question anywhere else, so i am just going to make a topic about it, how do you make it so admins can *NOT* trade? Because i am helping my friend build a server and he want's to make it fair so admin's cant trade spawned items but co-owners can, so thanks.
